elements.text:
Your partner has some strong opinions and you don't always agree with them. One evening, you invite a friend over for dinner and sense some possible tension. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm scared that my partner will say something offensive, but know that what they say is not a reflection on me.
I'm calm as we sit and eat dinner together.
I'm concerned that my friend will judge me for what my partner think, but am still happy we can get together and talk about it.
I'm worried that my partner will say something embarrassing.
I'm happy to have my friend over for dinner.
